data.text: I've worked with Daniel on a few projects, and I've always found him a highly skilled and dedicated professional. His technical project management skills have delivered company-recognized achievements. And on a side note, he is a great guy to work with! I can’t think of anyone I’d recommend more highly.
data.author: Laura Putnina

data.text: Daniel's dedication to continuous improvement and his drive to make a difference make him an invaluable asset to any organization. It was a delight to work alongside him, exploring various possibilities for improvement and analyzing how we could bring about positive change. His energy and enthusiasm were contagious, and his contributions left a lasting impact.
data.author: Magdalena Boguska

data.text: The combination of previous development experience with the management path brings up a unique person with an rare and unexpected blend of feats: A deep understanding of programming principles coupled with business requirement analysis and process optimization, resulting in continuously improving team efficiency and a super performant products exceeding expectations.
data.author: Nikos Galanis

data.text: Daniel has also a knack for fostering a collaborative and innovative environment, and his leadership style is one that encourages growth, continuous learning, and knowledge sharing. He is the kind of leader who listens and respects everyone's ideas, making sure that each team member feels valued and heard.
data.author: Sam Hayman
